ProductFulfillmentLocation.name: ProductFulfillmentLocation
ProductFulfillmentLocation.description: Associates a business account and a product inventory with the responsible field rep.

AccountId.description: The business account a field rep is responsible for visiting.

FulfillmentLocationId.description: The inventory location from which an order will be fulfilled.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LocationId.description: The location of the account the field rep visits.

Name.description: The name of the Product Fulfillment Location record.

ProductId.description: The name of the product the field rep fulfills at the account.

UserId.description: The field rep responsible for the account and inventory.
